definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: In the middle of the bridge,his old car spluttered out.
sentences.chinese: 在過橋走到橋中間時，他的那輛破車劈啪響着熄了火。

sentences.english: There is no half way work abut its influence.
sentences.chinese: 在它的影響中沒有中間道路。

sentences.english: All other event types, like changes or intermediary steps, are processed differently.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他事件類型，如變化或中間步驟，被區別對待。

sentences.english: Argent flowers were dotted among phoenixes.
sentences.chinese: 鸞鳥中間點綴着銀色的花枝。

sentences.english: The first peak that we climbed is the "Nazogl", which is the peak slightly left off the middle of this picture.
sentences.chinese: 像片中間稍微偏左的第一個山頂就是納佐格山頂。

sentences.english: He would order 300 musicians at a time to play the Yu for him.
sentences.chinese: 有一個南郭先生，本來不會吹竽，也混在中間湊數。

sentences.english: Next,put a cherry in the middle.
sentences.chinese: 其次，在中間放一個櫻桃。

sentences.english: So why is there not a third party that fills the gap?
sentences.chinese: 所以，爲什麼沒有第三黨來彌補這中間的差距？

sentences.english: Difluorobiphenyl is the key intermediate for the synthesis of antipyretic analgesic Diflunisal.
sentences.chinese: 二氟聯苯是合成消炎鎮痛藥氟苯水楊酸的關鍵中間體。

sentences.english: Middle rate is the arithmetic average rate of buying rate and selling rate, used for inter-bank.
sentences.chinese: 中間匯率是買入匯率和賣出匯率的算術平均數。

sentences.english: But anti-China rhetoric is hot in Washington and among many state and local officials.
sentences.chinese: 反中國的言論在華盛頓各級官員中間此起彼伏。

sentences.english: Most of the time the data is dependent upon the middleware being used.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數情況下，數據依賴於所使用的中間件。

sentences.english: He finally rummaged out her reply in the middle drawer of his desk.
sentences.chinese: 他最後從寫字檯中間抽屜裏翻找出她的覆信。

sentences.english: And some of them jumped up and went to Jesus right away.
sentences.chinese: 他們中間有些人聽了勸跳起來，去拿撒勒人耶穌。

sentences.english: Glancing to my left and right, I realised the car had become trapped between two trees.
sentences.chinese: 看看我的左右，我意識到，車卡在兩棵樹中間。

sentences.english: Staying comfortably in the middle of the crowd also cannot guarantee that one is on the right path.
sentences.chinese: 無風無浪的中間路線也不見得會是正途。

definition: one block/one piece/one (unit of money)/together/in the same place/in company
left/the left side/to the left of
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
to overlap/to superimpose/to telescope/to run together/to duplicate/one over another/superposition/an overlap/redundancy/reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步[san4 san4 bu4] to have a stroll)
